The amount of toxic russians kids and kids from other countries when you're in lower rank than LE is unbelievable. The problems with hitreg not working properly, 64tick servers after 8 years since the game's been out and still no engine update? Okay valve, continue like this and the game will die after a few more years. And don't even get me started on that pathetic Anti-Cheat... After 3800 hours(different profile) I think I've had enough. I'll still try to get back to supreme/global, but I don't have much hope for it since the team I'm getting is either dumb, or toxic, or straight up kills me for "not smoking short" for example.
